description:
In Dewa there is a hot spring that makes you younger and gives you beautiful skin.  The whole gang arrives to take a bath, but their underwear is stolen.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Momoiro Kikaku Yukemuri ni Kieta Shitagi!?
Peach Plan the Underwear That Disappeared into the Steam!?
桃色企画♡湯煙に消えた下着!?
